title: Lona (mythology)
extract:
In Hawaiian mythology, Lona is a female lunar deity who fell in love with and married a mortal, ʻAikanaka. They lived happily together until ʻAikanaka died of old age.

Lona and other deities

It is likely that Lona is just another name for the Moon goddess Hina.

A Hawaiian god with the similar name is Lono.

Notes
